explains: adj. 人种间的；人种混合的

sentences.en: Because interracial roommate relationships are often problematic.
sentences.cn: 因为跨种族的室友关系通常是有问题的。

sentences.en: At Indiana University, where housing was not so tight, more interracial roommates split up.
sentences.cn: 在印第安纳大学，住房不是很紧张，就有更多的跨种族室友分开了。

sentences.en: Researchers also observed problems resulting from pairing interracial students in residences.
sentences.cn: 研究人员还观察了让跨种族学生配成对住在宿舍所产生的问题。
